name: Down Town Rotti Hut (Ella)
address: Ella Village Inn, Down Town Rotti Hut, Ella
description: රසම රස උදේ කෑම, දවල් කෑම, රෑ කෑම වේලක් කන්න හරි හොඳ තේකක් නැත්නම් ස්වාභාවික පළතුරු යුෂ එකක් බොන්න හරි හ්ම්ම්.. හවස් වෙලා පොඩි ෂොට් එකක් දාන්න ඉන්නවනම් ඒකට සුපිරි බයිට් එකක් ගන්න වුනත් නියම තැනක්

name: Domenico's
description: Domenico's, headed by the former chef at Santoré was great addition to Colombo's pizza scene in 2014. Now they've expanded their menu with some much needed meats and it's that much better.
A weekly, eco-friendly, organic produce market in Batticaloa.
address: Bridge City and Village, near Kallady Bridge, Batticaloa
name: Bridge Market (Batticaloa)

description: Stunning Harry-Potter-esque vistas of trains and trees. Also, the Nine Arch Bridge is an iconic brick-and-stone built bridge.
name: Nine Arches Bridge (Demodara)

description: Jack Tree's food is pretty tasty, if you eat here you're probably going to eat till it hurts a little to walk. It is however, pricey. Is it authentic Thai? We didn't think so, you get food here that the Sri Lankan palate is quite used to.
name: Jack Tree
Thulasi Hotel (Badulla)
description: ආයෙ දවසක බදුල්ල පැත්තෙ රවුමක් දාන්න ඇවිත් පාන්දරින්ම බැස්සත් හිතට බයක් නෑනෙ. අංකල්ගෙ තුලසි හෝටලේ උදේ 6ට අරිනවනෙ.
address: Thulasi Hotel, Udaya Raja mawatha, Badulla.

description: Don's Deli is a little bakery on Marine Drive that doubles as a favourite spot for lamprais, and they also serve seafood at Fat Crab upstairs.
name: Don's Deli
Snog (Froyo)
description: Snog is a brand new frozen yoghurt cafe in Bamba, that strays from conventional froyos. It's relatively affordable and works well on warm days, but some of the flavours do come across as artificial.

name: Mongolian BBQ (Majestic City)
address: Mongolian sea food, B 1, Majestic city, Colombo 04.
description: එකම අවුල තියෙන්නෙ කන්න ආපු අයගෙ සතුටු සාමීචි වල අතුරු ප්‍රථිඵල. කන්කරච්චලේ කියල කියන්නෙ.

name: Makye Ame
description: A mix of authentic and Sri Lankanized Chinese food, run by the friendliest Chinese lady.

name: Scarlet Room (Colombo Courtyard)
description: The Scarlet room is Colombo Courtyard's Italian restaurant. Their all red theme may not appeal to some, but we found the food to be surprisingly affordable. Execution was a mixed bag, with a few dishes missing the mark and others doing quite well.

name: Sentosa Cafe
description: Sentosa is a Singaporean restaurant which seems to focus more on Malaysian fare, but also serves In

name: Mune's Kalu Dodol
description: Mune's Kalu Dodol is one of two places that we know of, that delivers high quality dodol to your doorstep.

7 Degrees North at Cinnamon Lakeside is actually one of the older bars in town now.  Their location by the Beira still makes for a great place to chill, and we like the fact that they're trying to keep things interesting with their ambitious cocktails but the execution has room for improvement.
name: 7 Degrees North (Cinnamon Lakeside)
EEAT
description: Small and underwhelming, EEAT is okay for a chinese roll and woodapple milkshake.

name: Il Cielo
address:
The Goldblock, 5th Floor, 
101/11 Hunupitiya Lake Road,
Colombo 2, 
Sri Lanka
description: New rooftop Italian fine dining restaurant behind Gangaramaya Temple

name: Gorgeous Cakes
description: A home baker who specializes in something other than cupcakes and cookies.
Saraswathie Lodge is another pure-veg South Indian spot on Galle Rd in Bambalapitiya. The ambience isn't as charming as nearby Greenlands Hotel but the thosai is marginally better.
name: Saraswathie Lodge (Bambalapitiya)

description: රසවත් වගේම ගුණවත් බෙලි මල් වීදුරුවක් හකුරු කෑල්ලක් සමඟ රස බලන විට ගතත් සිතත් පිනා යනුයේ අප‍්‍රමාණ ශක්තියකිනි.
name: Dunhinda Falls (Badulla)
Chapter One
address: 931C,  Ethul Kotte Road (Off Parliament Road), Ethul Kotte
description: With a great setting, decor and beautiful presentation, Chapter one disappoints when it comes down to execution.
Home of the best beef samosa. Gadaby is perfect for your short eat fix on the East Coast.
name: New Gadaby Rest Inn (Kaththankudy)
Crossroads
description: Crossroads, run by Tasty Caterers, is a good restaurant. With a funny menu dancing across a variety of cuisines (Thai, Western, Mexican, Italian, Sri Lankan) the food, while not authentic, lives up to the name of its proprietors and actually is quite tasty.

name: Park Street Trattoria
description: Park Street Trattoria is the newest addition to Park Street's fancy repertoire of restaurants. They've got a beautiful space, but the food has definite room for improvement.
Home for boys located in Mattakluliya
address: Maw Sevana, No. 12, Centre Road, Colombo 15.
name: Maw Sevana
Korean Barbecue KBQ
description: KBQ in Rajagiriya does fried chicken and noodles, with a Korean twist.

name: Machang (Kaduwela)
description: ගඟක් අයිනට වෙලා රසම රසම බයිට් එකක් නිදහසේ බොන්න කඩුවෙල පැත්තෙන් තැනක් හොයනවා නම් ඒ ඉතිං මචං අවන්හලම තමයි.

name: Jetwing Kaduruketha
description: Jetwing K. is one of the latest hotels by the popular chain, with a stellar line up of food, and a very rural, agricultural set-up.

name: Sheherazade Arabic Restaurant (Galadari)
address: Galadari Hotel, Ground Level, Fort, Colombo 01
description: They have okay-ish food, and have an Arabian-Nights-esque deco going on, but have room for vast improvement.

name: Sushi Kai
description: Sushi Kai is the new Japanese restaurant that's taken up the former location of Kami Maki. It may look familiar, but they fall well short when it comes to flavour and quality.
CLOSED: Aura is a new restaurant in town, with a great ambience and OK food.
name: Aura Café
Eat Italy (RIP)
description: Eat Italy is a new Italian restaurant in Mount Lavinia. Run by a friendly Italian family, they offer contemporary Italian cuisine and tasty italian pastries at affordable prices and filling portions.

name: Cafe Michaelangelo
description: Thin crust, wood-fired pizza, with toppings like Pol Sambol. Michaelangelo is good for delivery, if you're really patient.
A home-cook that's make seasonal Christmas pudding.
name: Christine's
The Cakery
description: The Cakery used to be a resident favourite amongst the plebs at office, but they've long since dwindled in terms of service and food.
Tiny little cafe with excellent froyo and plenty sandwiches, juices, smoothies, coffee and tea. Roast paan is on point.
name: Aviraté Café
The Pudding Stop
description: A new place which specializes in biscuit puddings.

name: Sweetberry
description: Sweetberry is a small juice bar which specializes in berries (strawberries, raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, etc).

name: China Manor
description: China Manor is a new hotel in Maradana with an authentic Chinese restaurant. Their crispy chicken is amazing.
Having been around since 2002, Barista is one of the first coffee shops to have popped up in Colombo.
name: Barista Lavazza (Laksala Thummulla)
Upali's
description: Upali's does affordable and tasty Sri Lankan food.
Naniyori is good value for money.  Decent dine-in at Nawala and best sushi delivery in Colombo.
name: Naniyori
Tenderfresh
description: A Singaporean franchise that does fried chicken with sambal sauce, and serves food super fast. As it should be.

name: Chambers
description: A lawyer's chambers turned Moroccan/Italian restaurant, they do their own take on moussaka, hummus and baba ghanoush.

name: Bakeology
address: 7 Barnes Place Residencies, Barnes Place, Colombo 07
description: A homebaker based in heart of Colombo 7 who specializes in peanut butter jelly cookies.
A street with a wide variety of food in the center of industrial Colombo. Find everything from mutton brain curry to devilled cuttlefish eggs.
name: Hulftsdorp Streetfood
address: Abdul Hameed Street, between Quarry Road and Oilman's Street

description: An "app" for hailing tuktuks, ostensibly. It doesn't work.
name: TukTuk
Jetwing Kaduruketha (Restaurant)
description: Whipping up some mouthwatering Sri Lankan and Western/ Fusion cuisine, Kaduruketha's restaurant is elegant and mouthwatering.

name: Butter Boutique
description: Butter Boutique has moved now! They're officially setting up shop at Rosmead Place so we went to check them out.

name: Tsukiji  Uoichi
address: Arcade Independence Square, Clock Tower 1st Floor, Independence Square, Colombo 7
description: Over a year since first opening its doors Tsukiji Uoichi is still going strong. They've got one of the most impressive Japanese menus in Colombo and they're execution is excellent. Their prices are on the higher end but the food is well worth it and the service is as efficient as it gets.
Playtrix is currently located at the Colombo Racecourse. The review below is for their former location at CR & FC.
name: Playtrix
address: Racecourse Grand Stand, GS08, Reid Avenue Colombo 7

name: Ashik
description: Ashik was once a popular choice amongst the YAMU staff for their rice and curry. Our latest visit left a negative impact on us though, and here's why.

name: Elite (Wattala)
description: Elite's been around Colombo for years, but now they've expanded their service to Wattala as well. They serve Chindian (Chinese and Indian) food.

name: Lords (Negombo)
description: One of Negombo's long term dining institutions.

name: Poppy Hana (Urban Kitchen)
address:
Urban Kitchen, 
Hyde Park Corner,
Colombo 2
description: Mid range conveyor belt sushi at Arpico's Urban Kitchen.

name: Grand Ella Motel
description: Owned by the Ceylon Hotel Corporation, the Grand Ella has a great view, okay service, and mediocre food.

name: Whight & Co
description: Whight & Co is amazing for coffee. They've got Cold Drip down to a science. The food is alright, too.
address: Marine Drive and Aloe Avenue, Colombo 3

name: Jungle Juice (Pelawatte)
description: සීතල ගතිය ගන්න අයිස් කැට ටිකක් දානව විතරයිනෙ. ඒ නිසා ජූස් එක හරිම ඝනයි.

name: Il Gelato (Duplication Road)
address: R A De Mel Mawatha, Colombo
description: Ice cream lovers rejoice! Il Gelato is back on Duplication Road. They've moved to a smaller location than their previous outlet, but the gelato is still as good.

name: Platinum Pier
address: 61, Moors Road, Marine Drive, Wellawatta, Colombo 06
description: Mirage Colombo's restaurant with Chef Lloyd's signature pizza, fish and chips and intercontinental fare.

name: Dinemore (Marine Drive)
description: Dinemore in Wellawatte by the sea has got their signature oozing-mayo subs and burgers, with a relaxing view of the ocean.

name: Sky Lounge (Kingsbury)
description: Kingsbury's rooftop bar serves up a stunning view and pricey drinks.

name: Choco Castle
description: Chocolate on crepes and waffles, hot chocolate, and a menu of savoury items, too. Choco Castle is a decent place to hang and indulge.

name: Batticaloa Muslim Hotel
description: A street-side eatery that does the best beef rottis in Batticaloa. Great for breakfast with plain tea.
Little Adam's Peak in Ella offers splendid views and a not-too-hard trek. There's a secondary peak a little way off which is even better.
name: Little Adam's Peak (Ella)
Tomato (Batticaloa)
description: Considered the only proper dine-in experience in Batticaloa, their Indian food is pretty good.

name: KGN Burgers on Wheels
description: KGN Burgers on Wheels is a food truck on Hill Street that serves up some surprisingly tasty burgers. It's only a two man operation, but it's very efficient, clean and they seem to be a hit with the folks.

name: Hotel De New Pilawoos (Bambalapitiya)
description: One of the top Kottu places in Bambalapitiya.

name: B: Us Chicken (RIP)
description: Korean fried chicken with some K-pop in the background.

name: Natural Coffee
description: Natural Coffee is one of Kandy's most popular coffee shops. They also have macha tea/ milk.

name: Lion Pub
description: The Lion Pub has the best entrance of any bar in Colombo and really cheap beer and good food in large portions

name: Licensed to Grill
address: George E de Silva Park, Dalada Veediya, Kandy
description: Licensed to Grill is a food stall which whips up wraps, burgers, and a couple of grilled items for super reasonable prices.

name: Serendipity Arts Cafe
description: This is a somewhat eccentric cafe with great music, interesting decor, and somewhat mediocre food.
Pranzo has an amazing view and serves pretty good Italian and 'Sritalian' fare.
name: Pranzo (Waters Edge)
address: 316, Polduwa Rd, Ethul Kotte Road, Battaramulla

name: Cheers (Cinnamon Grand)
address: Cinnamon Grand, Shri Uttarananda Road, Colombo 3
description: Cheers at Cinnamon Grand has been a mainstay in Colombo's pub scene for a while now. The food sticks to the usual English Pub food, and they do a satisfying job with it though the service was pretty darn slow in our case.

name: BakesByBella
description: Bakes by Bella has come a long way, from starting off as a little home baker to now having a full-blown delicatessen at Alfred House Avenue. They serve up a fantastic brunch menu in addition to a bunch of new treats up for grabs.

name: Blue Field Tea Centre
description: You can buy tea powder or tea leaves here, as well as sit down and have a cuppa. They've also got a small selection of pastries at times.

Steam Boat provides a lovely spot for sunset and wave watching. With an elevated cement and canopy dining area as well as shaded chairs and tables on the sand, venue wise they've got it spot on. Food, however, not so much.
name: Steam Boat (Mount Lavinia)
Love Bar
description: The kitschy new bar in town

name: VOC Cafe (Dutch Burgher Union)
description: The VOC is a one of the best places in the city to get lamprais, and we've heard their burgers are pretty good too.

name: The Stairway
description: An attic converted into a cafe, The Stairway is a new spot in the Fort run by a resident. Good rice and curry.

name: Meat & Co.
description: Meat & Co. is a home cook who grills some decent steaks at very reasonable prices
1973 වර්ෂයෙහි සැප්තැම්බර් මස 05වන දින ජාතික උද්‍යානයක් ලෙසින් ප‍්‍රකාශයකට පත් මෙම භූමිය වර්ග කිලෝමීටර් 0.15කට ආසන්න වපසරියකින් යුක්ත වේ.
name: Horagolla National Park
Subway
address: 347, R. A. De Mel Mawatha, Colombo 03
description: Swift service and healthy veggie options make Subway a worthy new franchise in Colombo.
An authentic and casual Japanese revamp of Work In Progress. Worth a try.
name: Ikoi Tei (Dutch Hospital)
Amangalla
description: One of the island's oldest and grandest colonial properties.
Arthur's pizza is now a pub, too. They do their own take on localised pizza.
name: Arthur's Pizza

description: Sri Vihar (formerly known as Shanthi Vihar) is a well-known vegetarian Indian restaurant located at the Thummulla Junction. Veering towards the south Indian side of things, they offer the standard selection of dosas, thalis and idlis as well as some north Indian dishes.
name: Sri Vihar
Spices (Hilton)
address: Hilton Colombo, Sir Chittampalam A Gardiner Mawatha, Fort, Colombo 01
description: Spices dabbles in Sri Lankan, Indian, and Western Cuisine. They're popular for their buffets, but have an a la carte menu as well.

name: Calorie Counter (Pelawatta)
description: Calorie Counter's now in Pelawatta and with it they've introduced a bunch of new healthy dishes and desserts.

name: Echelon Pub (RIP)
address: 2 Sir Chittampalam A. Gardiner Mawatha, Colombo 2
description: Echelon Pub has good pub food, cold beer and excellent service. It's not cheap but it's a reliable night out.

name: Udumbara JU Caterers
description: JU Caterers is an awesome rice & curry place - they combine tasteful ambience with bath kade prices.

name: Rocco's
description: Rocco's has a good dine-in restaurant in Rajagiriya serving wood-fired pizza with a wide range of toppings.

name: COi by Vichalya
description: COi is a creative restaurant by one of Sri Lanka's best young chefs. Get ready for heavy hits of umami and some unusual combinations of Sri Lankan ingredients and Japanese style.

name: Black Cat Café
description: The Black Cat Café serves up amazing sandwiches, coffee, and fresh fruit juices. They're also a B+B.

name: Dutch Gallery
description: The Dutch Gallery is an antique store cum jewelry store.
A website that delivers food from some of Colombo's restaurants
name: Foodie.lk

description: If you're looking for a different Christmas gift this season, why not some milk toffee from Nandi's.
name: Nandi's Milk Toffee
Yarl Eat House
description: The Yarl Eat House is perhaps Sri Lanka's best street-diner, serving spicy crab, prawns, mutton and cuttlefish along with a solid rice and curry, all for a reasonable price.

Elephant Corridor is a luxury boutique in sight of Sigiriya. Open since the 90s, it's one of the oldest boutique hotel on the island. With just 22 rooms and a vast premises, EC is ideal for a few days of seclusion.
name: Elephant Corridor
August by Mama Aida's
description: August By Mama Aida’s is the newest addition to Colombo’s Middle Eastern restaurant repertoire. With authentic dishes, exceptional service and a chic, relaxing setting, August looks like it’s here to stay.

name: Dwaraka
description: Dwaraka is a new pure vegetarian Indian restaurant in Bambalapitiya. Although we ran into a few hiccups, we still walked away pleased with our meal.

name: Tea Breeze  (Racecourse)
description: Tea Breeze is Mackwood's tea bar. They have decent teas, and good waffles.
address: GS 4, Ground Floor, Race Course Grand Stand, Reid Avenue, Colombo 07

description: This place used to be good for Sri Lankanized Nasi Goreng, but they've let their standards drop, abysmally.
name: Cherry Flower Chinese Restaurant
The Paddington
description: The new address they relocated to is easily accessible and there is plenty of parking. From a food POV, it may not impress everyone but the place sure is somewhere we can all relax at.
Run by a dynamic duo, Api Happi creates handloom bags and beanbags out of the best material they find. They've got funky colours and neat designs.
name: Api Happi
Peacock Beach Hotel (Hambantota)
description: හරිම ලස්සන වගේම තරමක් ගැඹුරු මුහුදු තීරයක් අයිනේ පිහිටලා තියෙන හම්බන්තොට පීකෝක් හෝලටය දවසක දෙකක හොඳ නිවාඩුවක් ගත කරන්න නම් කියාපු තැනක් තමයි.
PickMe is an app that lets you call cabs (trishaws, nanos, cars).  It mostly works and the company is responsive - we think they'll keep improving.
name: PickMe

description: Malay Restaurant in Dehiwala is hugely popular, and after trying our their stuff we can see why. The portions: massive, the flavours: excellent and the prices: reasonable.
name: Malay Restaurant

description: Colombo's only drive-through bakery. They've got good ice cream and amazing chocolate fudge cake.
name: The Bakery at the Edge (Waters Edge)
Townhouse by &Co
description: They're supposed to be a tea room, but they serve rice & curry, lamprais and other random stuff.

name: Vilasa Cottage
description: ''ත්‍රී ෆොර්ටි සර්'' මුදල් අයකැමි ගාණ කිව්වා. මගේ බඩ ගින්න එහෙම පිටින්ම නැතුව ගියා. ඒ මොකද කියල මගේ බත් පිඟානෙ ෆොටෝ එක දැක්කාම ඔයාලට තේරෙයි.
Flower Shows at Water’s Edge Park
address: Waters Edge Limited 316, Ethul Kotte Road , Battaramulla , Sri Lanka.
name: The Flower Market (Battaramulla)

description: A dedicated Negombo strip watering hole.
name: Rodeo Pub
Flow Health Bar
description: Flow Health Bar is a vegan health food stall in Ward Place that serves up a range of salads and healthy juices. Their stuff is undoubtedly healthy; however, their menu can be a bit confusing and their food just wasn't as flavoursome as we hoped.

name: Sri Ariyabawan Hotel (Borella)
description: ඒ දවස් වල අපි ආරියබවන් එකෙන් බූන්දි 100කුත් අරන් කෙලින්ම යන්නෙ මැගසින් රෝඩ් පැත්තට. හී... ගිහින් එන කොට අපිත් බූන්දි වගේ. පාට පාට වෙලා!
address: No. 42, D. S. Senanayake mawatha, Boerlla, Colombo 08

name: Korean Barbecue KBQ
description: KBQ in Rajagiriya does fried chicken and noodles, with a Korean twist.

name: Seafood Cove (Mt. Lavinia Hotel)
address: No 100, Hotel Road, Mount Lavinia, Sri Lanka.
description: Seafood Cove is Mt. Lavinia Hotel's seafood restaurant. It has a great location on their private beach front, fast service and reasonably priced, fresh seafood.

name: Galle Fort Hotel
description: One of the Fort's quintessential spots for accommodation and breakfast.

name: වාඩි Food (Pelawatta)
description: මිල ගණන් එක්ක බැලුවාම නම් වාඩි Food එකේ කෑම  වල රස ටිකක් විතර හොඳයි . ඒ වුනාට වැඩිපුර වියදම් කරල සුපිරි කෑම වේලක් කන්න තැනක් හොයන කෙනෙක්ට නම් මේ කඩේ හරියන එකක් නෑ මට හිතෙන්නෙ.

name: Boutique Cafe
description: They have a variety of dishes including Sri Lankan, Western, Arab, and Chinese.

name: The Chariot (Bambalapitiya)
description: The Chariot, most popular for their branch in Dehiwala, is an accessible and affordable stop for baked goods and rice and curry.
Ravana Falls is a waterfall located near Ella, and connected with the legends of the Ramayana
name: Ravana Falls (Ella)
Rasa Sayang Indian Food
description: Rasa Sayang is a new Indian take-out restaurant on Hill St, run by the same management as The Malay Restaurant.

name: 88 Restaurant (Dehiwela)
description: The longstanding 88 Chinese Restaurant has opened up a branch in Dehiwela, serving most items except for all pork dishes.

name: Lil' Orbits (Majestic City)
description: Lil' Orbits is an awesome place to go to for your sugar cravings. The prices are alright and the chocolate sauce is gold.

name: Lavinia Restaurant & Bar (Pelawatte)
description: ඇත්තටම යාළුවනේ රසම රස බයිට් එකක් එක්ක පොඩි ෂොට් එකක් දාන්න පැලවත්ත ලැවනියා අවන්හලට යන ඔයාලට එතන ඉන්න මිත‍්‍රශීලි සේවකයින්ගෙන් ලැබෙන සුහද සේවාව නිසා කිසිම අඩු පාඩුවක් වෙයි කියලා මම නම් හිතන්නේ නෑ.

name: Alumka Caterers (Thalawathugoda)
description: ඇලුම්කා කේටර්ස් එකේ කෑමවල තියෙන විශේෂත්වය තමයි ගෙවන මුදලට ලැබෙන කෑම ප‍්‍රමාණයේ විශාලත්වය. ලොකු බඩගින්නක හිටියත් ඒක කාලා ඉවර කරන්න නම් ටිකක් අමාරුයි.
CLOSED: Aura is a new restaurant in town, with a great ambience and OK food.
name: Aura Café
Choco Luv
description: This is a confused place. It's barely got anything to do with chocolate.
Good bean bags. 'nuff said.
name: Bean Bag Bliss

description: රාවණ රජ සමයෙහි ඉදිවූ විශිෂ්ඨ ශෛලමය නිර්මාණයක මෑත යුගයේ පිබිදීමක් ලෙසින් මෙම බොල් ස්වභාවය හැඳින්විය හැකිය.
name: Ravana Cave (Ella)
address: 16th Mile Post Junction, Ella, Uva Province

name: The Fab (Moratuwa)
description: යන එන ගමන් ගොඩවෙලා නිදහසේ කතා බහක යෙදෙන අතරෙ රසම රස ක්ෂණික ආහාර වේලක් රස බලන්න නම් මොරටුව ෆැබ් එක අපූරු තැනක්.

name: Choco Castle
description: Chocolate on crepes and waffles, hot chocolate, and a menu of savoury items, too. Choco Castle is a decent place to hang and indulge.
A splinter cell of Quickee, Speedee.lk delivers where its competitors fail. From munchies, to ice, to rolling papers and condoms, they'll sort you out from 10AM to 4AM.
name: Speedee.lk
Government Service Sports Club
description: Serving the best handallo in town, the GSSC is a dodgy bar with cheap drinks and decent patrons.

name: Governor's Restaurant (Mount Lavinia Hotel)
description: The Governor's Restaurant at the Mount Lavinia Hotel is one of the few hotel restaurants that offers real value for money with their dishes.

name: Zen (Zylan Boutique Hotel)
description: Zen is Zylan boutique hotel's hidden gem of a Japanese restaurant. They made a great first impression on our visit, and we love their new bento boxes.
Pub Sinhara gets brownie points for its menu and decor, but the cocktails let it down.
name: Pub Sinhara
Senkada Salaka Restaurant
description: සුහදශීලි සේවක මඩුල්ලක් ඉන්න නිසා වෙලාව නාස්ති කරගන්නෙ නැතුව රස කෑම වේලක් කන්න නම් පුරහල සෙන්කඩ සලාකා අවන්හල හොඳ තැනක් කියලා කියන්න පුළුවන්.

name: The Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf (Galle Road)
description: Serves coffee, frappes, shakes, and a bunch of baked goodies.

name: Oro 1889
description: With straightforward, authentic Neapolitan pizzas made in a wood-fired oven and simple yet chic décor, the family-run Oro 1889 is a treat.

name: Tuwan The Key Cutter
description: Tuwan is a friendly guy that cuts keys on a little alley off Havelock Road.
Suki's Wok is one of the oldies when it comes to Chinese eateries in Colombo. Nowadays they're mostly into delivery, so we tried it, and they're okay.
name: Suki's Wok

description: Portofino Resort in Tangalle is a idyllic south coast getaway. The service is great, the spa is even better, and the views aren’t too shabby eithe
name: Portofino Resort
Kamrose Restaurant (Panadura)
description: පානදුර පැත්තෙ ගියපු වෙලාවක රසම රස කෑම ටිකක් හිතේ හැටියට තෝරගෙන බඩ පැලෙනකන් කන්න කැම්රෝස් අවන්හල නම් කියාපු තැනක් තමයි.

name: London House of Coffee
description: London House of Coffee is a new coffee shop located on Gregory's Road serving Ceylon Coffee - roasted in-house.

name: Prego
description: Prego is an Italian restaurant in Negombo. Although the prices are high, the food is quite authentic and the ambience is chilled out.

name: Bencita On Wheels
description: Serving up waffles out of a food truck, Bencita On Wheels is a convenient take-away option if you travel through Dutugemunu Street.

name: The Icebair Restaurant
description: Icebair is a small, underrated, Swiss-owned outlet in Negombo with a great, rustic atmosphere.

name: The Noodle Monkey
description: The Noodle Monkey is a new cafe on Haig Road by Don Stanley's group. While their food has its merits, they've tried to do too much with the menu and the entire operation lacks direction.

name: The Red Pineapple by Torana
description: Nestled among the Torana shops on Galle Road, this little eatery serves up a good fried rice, a hefty chow mein, and quite a range of juices.

41 Sugar might be pricier than  other contemporary bars, but both its cocktails and food are honestly excellent. With an excellent rooftop setting to boot, the only thing they really need to fix is the attitude of their staff.
name: 41 Sugar

description: Home care for underprivileged cancer patients
address: Cancer Care Association,  56, Munasinghe Road, Galawilawatte, Homagama.
name: The Cancer Care Association Of Sri Lanka

description: Gerard Mendis Chocolatier is a fancy chocolate manufacturer on Horton Place that also offers a range of other desserts. While they charge a premium for their bite-sized chocolates, we found very little we actually enjoyed, and wished we had gone for a bar of Snickers instead. (And as for their cheesecake, don’t even get us started.)
name: Gerard Mendis Chocolatier
Shri Vani Vilas
description: This saivar kade does some killer dishes and has earned street cred for being the best in Colombo.

name: Kate Ryori
description: Kate Ryori is a homecook in Colombo that serves up tasty Japanese cuisine at affordable prices with some pretty filling portions to boot. It's a tiny operation, but she's pretty much the only Japanese homecook we know of and it's a great change-up from the usual Japanese restaurants.

name: Marrybrown
description: Right on Marine Drive, Marrybrown is a cheaper option for fried chicken and burgers. They're generous with their mayo, and their chicken is all about the crispy skin.

name: Redberry's
description: Meh. If you want not-fast fast food, Dinemore (which also has a branch on Marine Drive) is a more reliable option. While Redberry's has a good location, the food is mediocre.

name: Jetwing Ayurveda Pavilions
description: A serene escape in the midst of the bustling Negombo hotel strip.

name: Kat's Coffee
description: A lovely little coffee shop which serves some great homemade bread, and refreshing drinks.

name: Cafe Fort
description: A surprisingly  decent little cafe that's been around for a while located right next to the Dutch Hospital in Fort. They serve up some good rice and curry so it's a nice place to drop by when you're around the area during lunch time.
An old favourite, Wijaya Beach continues to serve up fresh seafood, excellent pizza and a sun-dappled ocean view.
name: Wijaya Beach
Round Island
address: 20, Shady Grove Avenue, Castle Street, Colombo 08
description: Round Island is a new restaurant that serves some kickass Modha (AKA Barramundi/Asian Sea Bass) dishes!

Park Street Mews Restaurant is one of those select few that have managed to remain relevant and maintain high standards throughout the years. They haven't changed much at all, but we're fine with that since the food is excellent, the service is fast and the unorthodox setting is still quite chic.
name: Park Street Mews Restaurant

description: Shangri-La's first foray into Sri Lanka, a full-service resort in the Deep South.
name: Shangri-La (Hambantota)
address: Sittrakala Estate, Chithragala, Ambalantota, Sri Lanka

name: Dolce Vita
description: Dolce Vita is a rustic and snug little Italian restaurant / café which serves everything from breakfast menus to snazzy drinks, pizzas and gelato.
A stall at Food Station that does kottu and iced milo all day.
name: Kottu & Co
Kurumba
description: A juice bar in Narahenpita that does juice right, for a really good price

name: Min Han
description: Min Han (or Ming Han) is one of our favorite Chinese restaurants. It's cheap, super tasty and the waiter Wijapayala orders for you.
Jagro's branch in Kotte more cozy and perfect for hangouts.
name: Simply Strawberries By Jagro (Kotte)
CP's Grill
description: CP's Grill at Nugegoda does some delicious grilled and non-grilled dishes for a decent price tag. We loved their Cheese Kottu.

name: Lobster Seafood Restaurant
description: Lobster Seafood Restaurant is a hidden gem of a restaurant that serves up some really good Sri Lankanised Chinese food.

name: Iceburg
description: Iceburg is one of the most popular spots in Maharagama that serves up some ok-ish burgers, submarines, waffles and sandwiches for a very affordable price tag.
A great place to cool off. Pun intended.
name: Snow Monkey (Food Station)

description: A no-brainer if you're looking for good food and relaxation away from the hubub of the busier areas of the Fort.
name: Pilgrims Hostel, Restaurant & Pizzeria
address: 6 Sudarmalaya Road, Galle, Sri, Parawa Street, Galle Fort

name: Graze Kitchen (Hilton Colombo)
description: The Hilton's brand new multi-cuisine restaurant and buffet.

name: Belmio Pizza
description: Belmio is a pizzeria in Thalawatugoda that serves up easily the best pizza in the area. They also deliver fast.

name: Banana Leaf
description: They do chicken biryani pretty darn good and now have crab and lamb on the menu.

name: The Cauldron
description: A coffee shop with an affordable and tasty take on Sri Lankan classics, and a nice location.
Plunkett doesn't offer a significant improvement over roadside kottu, though the ambience and service are quite nice.
name: Plunkett Posh Kottu
Zephyr Talalla
description: A villa-restaurant and bar affair with a great space and ambience gently, leading you into the huge and rather deserted Talalla Beach

name: Sudarshan Veg
description: A 100%  veg restaurant serving North and South Indian food.

name: Quick Thai (Battaramulla)
description: Quick Thai serves up a range of affordable Thai dishes that are low on refinement, yet big on taste, from its modest, but elegant Pelawatta premises.

name: Aasife Biriyani
address: 939, Ethul Kotte Road, Sri Jayawardana Pura, Rajagiriya
description: Aasife is good place to get biriyani in Ethul Kotte. The food is good and service friendly.

name: E-Cafe (Kollupitiya)
description: A coffee shop down Galle Road which is only good for coffee.
Plunkett doesn't offer a significant improvement over roadside kottu, though the ambience and service are quite nice.
name: Plunkett Posh Kottu
Ceylon Sliders (Cafe)
address: No 9 New Galle Rd, Rest House Junction, Weligama, Weligama 81700
description: A cafe and hangout spot in Weligama
Zephyr is a very exciting new restaurant and bar on the Mirissa beach stretch. The food is good, and they've got a great ambience that sticks out from the rest.
name: Zephyr Restaurant & Bar
Le Papillon
address: No. 21A, Sir Ernest De Silva Mawatha, Colombo 7.
description: A multi cuisine restaurant serving some dope waffles and coffee.
A cosy little place tucked into an old Galle Fort house that sells Italian gelato and coffee
name: Il Gelato Galle Fort
Le Papillon
address: No. 21A, Sir Ernest De Silva Mawatha, Colombo 7.
description: A multi cuisine restaurant serving some dope waffles and coffee.

name: Kopi Kade
description: Excellent coffee and small plates of modern Sri Lankan cuisine.

name: Street Food Republic
description: Street food from around the world.

name: Aloha Coffee Gallery Mirissa
address: Aloha Coffee Gallery, Sunanda Road, Mirissa
description: A great place for coffee and breakfast run out of a garage

name: Shang Palace (Shangri-La Colombo)
description: Shangri-La's signature restaurant, serving a range of traditional Chinese cuisine.
But te fresh catch, wait until they make it for you and eat it on the beach!
name: Sea Food Weligama (Mama's Place) at Fishpoint Weligama
Aasife Biriyani
address: 939, Ethul Kotte Road, Sri Jayawardana Pura, Rajagiriya
description: Aasife is good place to get biriyani in Ethul Kotte. The food is good and service friendly.

name: Verse Collective
description: A great spot for drinks and hangs in Hiri, food could definitely improve though
The Fashionmarket.lk phygital store is the material equivalence to their online store.
name: Fashionmarket.lk Phygital Store

description: A small beach with great surfing, lots of greenery and some fine establishments for eats and hangs
name: Hiriketiya Beach
Ramen Misoya Colombo
description: Ramen Misoya is Colombo's only Japanese restaurant that specializes in miso-based ramen. They've got a small menu that they nail quite well along with a surprisingly brilliant fried rice.

name: Kottulabs.lk
description: Kottulabs.lk does some good kottu in many interesting ways. You can place your orders through their neat website, and they deliver to your doorstep.
Great granola delivered by tuk!
name: 3x3 Granola
The Grove Hiriketiya
description: A nice place for food and hanging out at Hiriketiya

name: Chillax Garden Pub
description: An outdoor bar on Marine Drive with beer on tap from 11 AM to Midnight.

name: Cafe Nuga
description: A healthy organic spot with a wide range of delicious dishes.

name: Hot Ginger
description: Great place to have a delicious Sri Lankan  rice & curry or a western type dinner.

name: The Embazzy
description: A cozy bistro serving excellent coffee and multi-cuisine comfort food.

name: Gihans Family Restaurant
address: 68, S De S. Jayasinghe Road, Kohuwala Dehiwala, Colombo
description: A great place for a quick lunch or dinner.

name: Cafe Nuga
description: A healthy organic spot with a wide range of delicious dishes.
The location does wonders for what is otherwise a mediocre bar
name: Taphouse by RnR, Galle Fort
Mitsi's Delicacies
description: Mitsi's Cafe was one of those hidden gems we uncovered in 2013. One year down the line, the food is still good, the service is friendly and the desserts are exceptional.

name: Red Orchids
description: Great please to have a delicious Chinese, Thai dinner freely

name: The Embazzy
description: A cozy bistro serving excellent coffee and multi-cuisine comfort food.

name: Cafe Sociale
description: A retro themed cafe serving filling dishes and average coffee.

name: Pages & Coffee
description: A great place to sit and enjoy some organic coffee amongst loads of books.

name: Cafe Sociale
description: A retro themed cafe serving filling dishes and average coffee.
bed and breakfast with cabanas on a relatively isolated patch of beach
name: Bara Beach Home
Black Cat Café
description: The Black Cat Café serves up amazing sandwiches, coffee, and fresh fruit juices. They're also a B+B.

name: Gemi Uyana
description: A buth kade serving decent packs throughout lunchtime.

name: Gemi Uyana
description: A buth kade serving decent packs throughout lunchtime.

name: Chocoholics
description: They put chocolate on everything.

name: Urban Green
description: Nice, cosy café with nice, recycled furniture and a shaded terrace.

name: Chocoholics
description: They put chocolate on everything.

name: Salt Hiriketiya
description: Salt makes some great food and provides a beautiful space to eat it

name: Butter Boutique (Park Street Mews)
description: Treat yourselves with decadent, delicious cakes and some of Colombo's best coffee, at Butter Boutique's newest branch at Park Street.

name: Cafe Alfred
description: A small toast and coffee joint in Alfred House Garden.

name: Bavarian German Restaurant
description: The Bavarian has been around for ages, and is still hugely popular. Change can be a good thing but sometimes when you're doing something right, you should stick to it, and that's exactly what the German Restaurant has done.

name: Tiki Cliff Top Restaurant and Bar
description: A bar cum restaurant with a great view, great grub and the chillest vibes in Weli. What more do you need

name: Butter Boutique (Park Street Mews)
description: Treat yourselves with decadent, delicious cakes and some of Colombo's best coffee, at Butter Boutique's newest branch at Park Street.
Pink Lotus Restaurant is one of the most popular family restaurants in Malabe area. They've got some okay Chinese food with a Sri Lankan twist.
name: Pink Lotus Restaurant
Burger Q
description: Yet another fast food joint that dishes out some ok-ish burgers and submarines for an affordable price tag.

name: Tea Avenue - Marine Drive
description: A smaller cousin to their Barnes Place branch, Tea Avenue Marine Drive has the same relaxed ambience, making it a great place for meeting friends and for working along Marine Drive. The tea and food, however, were a tad underwhelming

name: Peri Peri Kukula
description: As the name suggests, Peri Peri Kukula specialises in spicy flame-grilled chicken along with some tasty sides.

name: Side Walk Cafe
description: Good place to try snacks even lunch.

name: Café Noir Blanc
address: No. 216, Rev. Muruththettuwe Ananda Nahimi Mawatha, Colombo 5
description: Café Noir's attempt to take over Colombo's caffeine industry is slowly reaching its peak as they opened a new branch at Thimbirigasyaya. Are they good, though?

name: Café Noir Blanc
address: No. 216, Rev. Muruththettuwe Ananda Nahimi Mawatha, Colombo 5
description: Café Noir's attempt to take over Colombo's caffeine industry is slowly reaching its peak as they opened a new branch at Thimbirigasyaya. Are they good, though?

name: Yaal Restaurant
description: Yaal Restaurant down Marine Drive still serves some very tasty and not-too-pricey food, and their crab curry is still good - though it's their biriyani that blew us away.

name: Silver Spoon
description: An awesome place to get booze while having delicious Chinese and Thai food

name: Coffee & Company
description: The perfect coffee shop to bring your date, a bunch of friends or just a book.

name: Chola Authentic Indian Restaurant
description: Chola is a new Indian Restaurant serving some of the best Indian we have tried.
Panorama is a bar cum restaurant that we don't love as a restaurant, though we have heard good things about the bar. Come here at sunset for the view and don't be too picky about anything else.
name: Panorama (Colombo City Hotel)
Tokiwa Cafe
description: Dwell Sri Lanka's Japanese inspired cafe where you can enjoy great food within a relaxed space.

name: Tokiwa Cafe
description: Dwell Sri Lanka's Japanese inspired cafe where you can enjoy great food within a relaxed space.
